Claim: "Computer models of doom are just simulations"
Implication: "We should not trust these computer models of doom"
Referring expressions: Computer models, doom, simulations  These computer models, doom
Formula: (exists c (exists a (IsSimulation(c) and ~IsDoom(a))) & (forall g (forall f (forall e ( IsTrusted(e,f) ->  IsSimulation(g)))))) -> (exists d (exists a (~IsTrusted(d,a))))
